sentences.en: A wicker basket anglers for carrying fish.
sentences.cn: 大的柳条编织的篮子(通常是一对).

sentences.en: A wicker basket, especially one used by anglers for carrying fish.
sentences.cn: 柳条篮一种用柳条编成的篮子, 尤指捕鱼人用来捕鱼的柳条鱼篓.

sentences.en: Arts & Crafts : all kinds of straw - woven & wicker baskets.
sentences.cn: 工艺品: 各种草编 、 柳编工艺制品.

sentences.en: At their feet sat two full wicker baskets of watermelons, some on the ground.
sentences.cn: 在他们脚边放着两个大柳条筐西瓜, 还有几个摆放在地上.

sentences.en: Chuehhsin walked over to the window and sat down on a wicker chair.
sentences.cn: 他走到窗前,在藤椅上坐下去.

sentences.en: Claire spent the morning in a wicker rocker on the screened porch with a book.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔整个早上都在装着纱窗的走廊里坐在柳条摇椅上看书。

sentences.en: He donned work clothes and a wicker helmet.
sentences.cn: 他穿上工作服,戴上柳条帽.

sentences.en: He put rarely - used things into the wicker bag.
sentences.cn: 他将不常用的东西放入柳条包.

sentences.en: Lacquerware, Ceramics, Garden Decorative Items , Wicker Articles , Table Accessories and Decrative Items.
sentences.cn: 采购产品漆器, 陶瓷, 花园装饰物, 柳条的文章, 表配件.

sentences.en: Shuck wicker skin, connect body to show white, call white wicker.
sentences.cn: 把柳条剥去皮, 通体呈白色, 就叫白柳条.

sentences.en: Sitting in his wicker chair, he gazed reflectively at the fire.
sentences.cn: 他坐在藤椅上，若有所思地凝视着炉火。

sentences.en: The factory specializes in wicker safety helmets.
sentences.cn: 这是一家专门制作柳条帽的工厂.

sentences.en: The living room is furnished simply with wicker furniture.
sentences.cn: 客厅里简单地摆放着几件柳编家具。

sentences.en: We sat side by side on two wicker seats.
sentences.cn: 我们在两把柳条椅上肩并肩坐着。

sentences.en: You're too weak for a plow, too clumsy for carrying the wicker!
sentences.cn: 让你耕地, 你太柔弱,拿着箩筐也笨手笨脚!

trans.tran_cn: 柳条编织的；装在柳条编织物里的
柳条（编制品），（编制筐篓的）枝条
trans.tran_en: thin dry branches or reeds that are woven together
